events.name: Flood and Humanitarian Crisis in Pakistan
events.wd_label: Flood and Humanitarian Crisis in Pakistan
events.wd_description: The intense monsoon season in Pakistan led to severe flooding, resulting in a humanitarian crisis with widespread displacement, significant loss of life, and damage to agriculture.
events.description: The intense monsoon season in Pakistan led to severe flooding, resulting in a humanitarian crisis with widespread displacement, significant loss of life, and damage to agriculture.

events.name: Intense Monsoon
events.wd_description: The World Meteorological Organization reported an unusually intense monsoon season in Pakistan and northwest India, with some areas in Sindh receiving over 1,288 millimeters of rain in August.
events.description: The World Meteorological Organization reported an unusually intense monsoon season in Pakistan and northwest India, with some areas in Sindh receiving over 1,288 millimeters of rain in August.

events.name: Flooding and Casualties
events.wd_description: The flooding caused by the monsoon has been described as the worst disaster in Pakistan's history, with 1,100 deaths, 2,600 injuries, and millions displaced, along with significant agricultural losses.
events.description: The flooding caused by the monsoon has been described as the worst disaster in Pakistan's history, with 1,100 deaths, 2,600 injuries, and millions displaced, along with significant agricultural losses.

events.name: Government and UN Response
events.wd_description: The Pakistani government is conducting rescue operations, while the United Nations launched a $116 million campaign to support flood victims.
events.description: The Pakistani government is conducting rescue operations, while the United Nations launched a $116 million campaign to support flood victims.

events.name: Attack on Nigerian prison by Boko Haram
events.wd_label: Attack on Nigerian prison by Boko Haram
events.wd_description: The Islamic State claimed responsibility for an attack on a Nigerian prison where approximately 440 inmates escaped, highlighting the ongoing security challenges in the country.
events.description: The Islamic State claimed responsibility for an attack on a Nigerian prison where approximately 440 inmates escaped, highlighting the ongoing security challenges in the country.

events.name: prison attack
events.wd_description: Boko Haram insurgents attacked a medium-security prison to free their members, resulting in one security officer killed and three others injured.
events.description: Boko Haram insurgents attacked a medium-security prison to free their members, resulting in one security officer killed and three others injured.

events.name: prison break
events.wd_description: During the attack, 879 inmates fled the facility, with 443 still at large, four inmates dead, and 16 injured.
events.description: During the attack, 879 inmates fled the facility, with 443 still at large, four inmates dead, and 16 injured.

events.name: President Buhari's response
events.wd_description: President Muhammadu Buhari visited the prison, condemned the attack, and questioned the prison's security system while ordering investigations.
events.description: President Muhammadu Buhari visited the prison, condemned the attack, and questioned the prison's security system while ordering investigations.

events.name: separate attack on presidential convoy
events.wd_description: In a separate incident, the convoy of President Buhari was ambushed on his way to Daura for Islamic festivals, further highlighting the security challenges in Nigeria.
events.description: In a separate incident, the convoy of President Buhari was ambushed on his way to Daura for Islamic festivals, further highlighting the security challenges in Nigeria.

events.name: Nancy Pelosi's visit to Taiwan
events.wd_description: US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi visited Taiwan, marking the most senior US politician visit in 25 years, prompting strong reactions from China.
events.description: US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi visited Taiwan, marking the most senior US politician visit in 25 years, prompting strong reactions from China.

events.name: Pelosi's visit
events.wd_description: Nancy Pelosi, the most senior US politician to visit Taiwan in 25 years, met with leaders in Taipei's capital.
events.description: Nancy Pelosi, the most senior US politician to visit Taiwan in 25 years, met with leaders in Taipei's capital.

events.name: Chinese government's response
events.wd_description: The Chinese government accused the United States of violating China’s sovereignty under the guise of democracy, with Foreign Minister Wang Yi issuing a warning.
events.description: The Chinese government accused the United States of violating China’s sovereignty under the guise of democracy, with Foreign Minister Wang Yi issuing a warning.

events.name: Pelosi's statement
events.wd_description: Nancy Pelosi stated that China cannot prevent world leaders from traveling to Taiwan to respect its democracy, highlight its successes, and reaffirm commitment to collaboration.
events.description: Nancy Pelosi stated that China cannot prevent world leaders from traveling to Taiwan to respect its democracy, highlight its successes, and reaffirm commitment to collaboration.

events.name: Biden's disapproval
events.wd_description: President Joe Biden, Pelosi's party colleague, did not approve of her visit, stating that the American military felt it was "not a good idea right now" due to high tensions with China.
events.description: President Joe Biden, Pelosi's party colleague, did not approve of her visit, stating that the American military felt it was "not a good idea right now" due to high tensions with China.

events.name: Strategies to develop a sustainable EV battery supply chain in the U.S.
events.wd_label: Strategies to develop a sustainable EV battery supply chain in the U.S.
events.wd_description: A comprehensive national strategy involving short-term, medium-term, and long-term measures to develop a sustainable EV battery supply chain in the U.S. and reduce reliance on China.
events.description: A comprehensive national strategy involving short-term, medium-term, and long-term measures to develop a sustainable EV battery supply chain in the U.S. and reduce reliance on China.

events.name: short-term measures
events.wd_description: Immediate actions to increase EV production in the U.S., including assembling EVs domestically, securing temporary waivers for imports, and expanding charging infrastructure.
events.description: Immediate actions to increase EV production in the U.S., including assembling EVs domestically, securing temporary waivers for imports, and expanding charging infrastructure.

events.name: t: domestic assembly
events.wd_description: Six of the ten best-selling EV models in 2022 are already assembled in the U.S., and more companies are planning to open assembly lines.
events.description: Six of the ten best-selling EV models in 2022 are already assembled in the U.S., and more companies are planning to open assembly lines.

events.name: t: temporary waiver for imports
events.wd_description: A temporary waiver for Korean-made EVs and batteries could facilitate the transition and encourage Korean battery makers to move their supply chain to the U.S.
events.description: A temporary waiver for Korean-made EVs and batteries could facilitate the transition and encourage Korean battery makers to move their supply chain to the U.S.

events.name: t: charging infrastructure expansion
events.wd_description: The 2021 Infrastructure Act provided $5 billion to expand charging infrastructure, which is critical for bolstering EV demand.
events.description: The 2021 Infrastructure Act provided $5 billion to expand charging infrastructure, which is critical for bolstering EV demand.

events.name: medium-term measures
events.wd_description: Diversifying lithium and cobalt supplies through international trade and diplomacy, and promoting the production of alternative battery chemistries.
events.description: Diversifying lithium and cobalt supplies through international trade and diplomacy, and promoting the production of alternative battery chemistries.

events.name: t: securing lithium supply
events.wd_description: Investing in regions like the Lithium Triangle of South America and partnering with Australia, which leads in lithium production and has rich cobalt deposits.
events.description: Investing in regions like the Lithium Triangle of South America and partnering with Australia, which leads in lithium production and has rich cobalt deposits.

events.name: t: securing cobalt supply
events.wd_description: Partnering with Australian mining companies and avoiding reliance on cobalt from the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
events.description: Partnering with Australian mining companies and avoiding reliance on cobalt from the Democratic Republic of the Congo.

events.name: t: promoting alternative batteries
events.wd_description: Supporting the production of lithium-iron-phosphate (LFP) batteries, which are cheaper and use more abundant minerals, as patents expire and production scales up.
events.description: Supporting the production of lithium-iron-phosphate (LFP) batteries, which are cheaper and use more abundant minerals, as patents expire and production scales up.

events.name: long-term measures
events.wd_description: Replacing overseas critical materials with domestic mining operations and investing in the research and development of new battery technologies.
events.description: Replacing overseas critical materials with domestic mining operations and investing in the research and development of new battery technologies.

events.name: t: domestic mining
events.wd_description: Developing domestic mining operations for lithium and cobalt, despite the lengthy permitting process, to reduce reliance on foreign sources.
events.description: Developing domestic mining operations for lithium and cobalt, despite the lengthy permitting process, to reduce reliance on foreign sources.

events.name: t: R&D investment
events.wd_description: Investing in research and development of new battery technologies to build a sustainable and competitive EV battery industry in the U.S.
events.description: Investing in research and development of new battery technologies to build a sustainable and competitive EV battery industry in the U.S.
